6.text: One vowel many sounds many sounds one vowel one is a short sound, book, cook, bull and full. The other is a long sound, spoon, broom, blue and true.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate="70%">One vowel many sounds many sounds one vowel one is a short sound,<break time="300ms"/> book,<break time="300ms"/> cook,<break time="300ms"/> bull and full.<break time="500ms"/> The other is a long sound,<break time="300ms"/> spoon,<break time="300ms"/> broom,<break time="300ms"/> blue and true.</prosody></speak>

7.text: Read the poem aloud and ask the students to repeat. With the highlighted words, explain the difference between the long and the short vowel sounds | u | and |u:|.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate="70%">Read the poem aloud and ask the students to repeat.<break time="500ms"/> With the highlighted words,<break time="300ms"/> explain the difference between the long and the short vowel sounds | u | and |u:|.</prosody></speak>
